channel.title: +1 Forward - FitD series - Brinkwood: The Blood of Tyrants
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-fitd-brinkwood-the-blood-of-tyrants
Rach and Rich continue their second Summer Series. This series covers games in the Forged in the Dark (FitD) style of PbtA games. This seventh episode features Erik Bernhardt.
Timecodes: 00:04:14 - **Setting Position and Effect** - Long-term play and campaign building for Forged in the Dark games 00:10:55 - **Progress Clock** on *Brinkwood: The Blood of Tyrants* 00:25:59 - **The Score** - Rich and Rach construct a Fae Patron
Find more *Brinkwood* info at [brinkwood.net](https://brinkwood.net/)
Or, you can pre-order *Brinkwood: The Blood of Tyrants* here: https://brinkwood.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders

Rach and Rich continue their second Summer Series. This series covers games in the Forged in the Dark (FitD) style of PbtA games. This seventh episode features Erik Bernhardt.
